ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(CRM_Domain__c, 'HOT'), IsActive, NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "Tromso")) && NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "Nordland")) && NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "Trondelag")) && NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "More_og_Romsdal")) && NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "Vestland")) && NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "Innlandet")) && NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "Vest_Viken")) && NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "Ost_Viken")) && NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "Oslo")) && NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "Vestfold_og_Telemark")) && NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "Rogaland")) && NOT(INCLUDES(HOT_PreferredRegions__c, "Agder")) )
